4.text:
fill = config.theme.candyFill
border = config.theme.candyBorder
size = 10
lineWidth = 2

21.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    right,
    bottom,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

16.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    left,
    node.y,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

20.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    node.x,
    bottom,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

11.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    left,
    top,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

12.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    node.x,
    top,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

3.text:
left = node.x - node.w
top = node.y - node.h
right = node.x + node.w
bottom = node.y + node.h

19.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    left,
    bottom,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

18.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    right,
    node.y,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)

13.text:
centerSquare(
    ctx,
    right,
    top,
    size,
    fill,
    border,
    lineWidth
)
